channel.title: CVE Feed for yandex -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for yandex -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-7369|2024-09-17T01:21:44.428Z -- yandex -- yandex%20browser
item.description: User Interface (UI) Misrepresentation of Critical Information vulnerability in the address bar of the Yandex Browser allows an attacker to obfuscate the true source of data as presented in the browser. This issue affects the Yandex Browser version 20.8.3 and prior versions, and was fixed in version 20.8.4 released October 1, 2020.

item.title: CVE-2024-6473|2024-09-03T13:55:15.844Z -- yandex -- browser
item.description: Yandex Browser for Desktop before 24.7.1.380 has a DLL Hijacking Vulnerability because an untrusted search path is used.

item.title: CVE-2024-6473|2024-09-03T10:35:59.145Z -- yandex -- browser
item.description: Yandex Browser for Desktop before 24.7.1.380 has a DLL Hijacking Vulnerability because an untrusted search path is used.
